meanings.definition: Not carefully thought about or planned.
meanings.sent1: The unconsidered decision led to chaos.
meanings.sent2: She made an unconsidered remark that offended him.
meanings.sent3: His unconsidered actions always end in trouble.
meanings.sent4: The unconsidered move in the game cost him victory.
meanings.sent5: The unconsidered choice left a trail of consequences.

meanings.definition: Not regarded or treated with due consideration or respect.
meanings.sent1: The unconsidered gift was quickly forgotten.
meanings.sent2: He felt unconsidered by his colleagues at work.
meanings.sent3: The unconsidered puppy wagged its tail happily.
meanings.sent4: Her unconsidered words left a mark on his heart.
meanings.sent5: The unconsidered painting was hidden in the corner.
